Description: Bottle with an everted recurved rim and a rounded base; smoothing marks on the exterior and four lightly incised bands around the neck, cream-light brown fabric with clearly visible micaceous inclusions, discoloured to a grey colour on one side. Wheel-made. Complete.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Northern Dongola Reach, Site P37 Grave (G4) Context 27
Curator's comments: Published: Nubia - los Reinos del Nilo de Sudàn [exhibit catalogue] (2003). "Cuenco" p.277, Cat no.253.
Bibliographic references: Welsby Sjöström 2001a / The Pottery from the Survey (p.293, fig. 5.24)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sudan Archaeological Research Society
Division of Finds: National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums (NCAM)
Acquisition notes: Division of finds from the National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums, Khartoum to SARS, the license holder.
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 1268x (excavation type series number)
